dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing over 163,000 images, each accompanied by at least five captions by human annotators, making it suitable for tasks involving image captioning and visual recognition.
dcterms:title: MS-COCO

dcterms:creator: Elia Bruni
Nam-Khanh Tran
Marco Baroni
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 3,000 pairs of English words with semantic similarity judgments, useful for evaluating models of word similarity and semantic understanding.
dcterms:title: MEN Test Collection
